meaning: a thing characteristic of its kind
description: Used to illustrate a general rule or principle.
example: This painting is a good example of his early work. (EN) Ce tableau est un bon exemple de son travail précoce. (FR)

description: Used as a greeting when meeting someone.
example: Hello, how are you today? (EN) Bonjour, comment allez-vous aujourd'hui? (FR)

meaning: a procedure to assess quality or performance
description: An examination of something to determine its characteristics.
example: We need to run a test to verify the results. (EN) Nous devons effectuer un test pour vérifier les résultats. (FR)
